sql.if: and (CASE WHEN (B.PLANSTARTTIME > #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND D.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR D.ITEMNAME = 'SSP' THEN '0' WHEN (D.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND B.ACTUALFINISHTIME, > B.PLANFINISHTIME) OR (B.ACTUALFINISHTIME IS NULL AND #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# > B.PLANFINISHTIME) THEN '1' WHEN (B.PLANSTARTTIME < #CURRENTTIMESTR:DATE# AND D.ITEMNAME = 'INI') OR (D.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND B.SPI < 1) THEN '2' WHEN (D.ITEMNAME = 'RUN' AND B.SPI >= 1) OR (D.ITEMNAME = 'COP' AND B.PLANFINISHTIME >= B.ACTUALFINISHTIME) THEN '3' END) = #ONTIMESTATE#

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM (SELECT DISTINCT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP, X.EXECUTOR, X.SPI, X.COMPLETIONRATE, X.PLANSTARTTIME, X.PLANFINISHTIME, X.ACTUALFINISHTIME, X.ACTUALSTARTTIME, X.IMPORTANCELEVEL, X.EXECUTESTATUS, X.ONTIMESTATE, X.PROJECTTYPE FROM $TABLENAME$ X INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE Y ON Y.TYPEGUID = X.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE (Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID# OR X.CREATEUSER=#USERGUID#) AND X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID# ) B LEFT JOIN $PROJECTTABLENAME$ J ON B.PROJECTTYPE = J.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL D ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = D.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_USER E ON B.EXECUTOR = E.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_GROUP F ON B.OWNERGROUP = F.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL I ON B.ONTIMESTATE = I.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON B.IMPORTANCELEVEL = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID WHERE 1=1

SELECT COUNT(1) rowcount$$ FROM $TABLENAME$ B LEFT JOIN $PROJECTTABLENAME$ J ON B.PROJECTTYPE = J.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL D ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = D.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_USER E ON B.EXECUTOR = E.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_GROUP F ON B.OWNERGROUP = F.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL I ON B.ONTIMESTATE = I.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON B.IMPORTANCELEVEL = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID WHERE B.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID#

SELECT B.GUID GUID, B.MD_ID, B.MD_NAME, B.SPI, B.COMPLETIONRATE, B.PLANSTARTTIME, B.PLANFINISHTIME, B.ACTUALSTARTTIME, B.ACTUALFINISHTIME, J.MD_NAME PROJECTTYPE, F.GROUPNAME AS OWNERGROUPNAME, E.USERNAME AS MANAGER, G.ITEMNAME AS IMPORTANCELEVELNAME, G.TITLE AS IMPORTANCELEVELTITLE, D.ITEMNAME AS EXECUTESTATUSNAME, D.TITLE AS EXECUTESTATUSTITLE, I.ITEMNAME AS ONTIMESTATENAME, I.TITLE AS ONTIMESTATE FROM (SELECT DISTINCT X.GUID, X.MD_ID, X.MD_NAME, X.OWNERUSER, X.OWNERGROUP, X.EXECUTOR, X.SPI, X.COMPLETIONRATE, X.PLANSTARTTIME, X.PLANFINISHTIME, X.ACTUALFINISHTIME, X.ACTUALSTARTTIME, X.IMPORTANCELEVEL, X.EXECUTESTATUS, X.ONTIMESTATE, X.PROJECTTYPE FROM $TABLENAME$ X INNER JOIN PPM_PROJECTROLE Y ON Y.TYPEGUID = X.GUID INNER JOIN PPM_ROLEMEMBERS Z ON Y.GUID = Z.PROJECTROLEGUID WHERE (Z.USERGUID = #USERGUID# OR X.CREATEUSER=#USERGUID#) AND X.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID# ) B LEFT JOIN $PROJECTTABLENAME$ J ON B.PROJECTTYPE = J.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL D ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = D.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_USER E ON B.EXECUTOR = E.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_GROUP F ON B.OWNERGROUP = F.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL I ON B.ONTIMESTATE = I.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON B.IMPORTANCELEVEL = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY $SORTFIELD$
ORDER BY B.PLANSTARTTIME DESC

SELECT B.GUID, B.MD_ID, B.MD_NAME, B.COMPLETIONRATE, B.PLANSTARTTIME, B.PLANFINISHTIME, B.ACTUALSTARTTIME, B.ACTUALFINISHTIME, J.MD_NAME PROJECTTYPE, B.SPI, F.GROUPNAME AS OWNERGROUPNAME, E.USERNAME AS MANAGER, G.ITEMNAME AS IMPORTANCELEVELNAME, G.TITLE AS IMPORTANCELEVELTITLE, D.ITEMNAME AS EXECUTESTATUSNAME, D.TITLE AS EXECUTESTATUSTITLE, I.ITEMNAME AS ONTIMESTATENAME, I.TITLE AS ONTIMESTATE FROM $TABLENAME$ B LEFT JOIN $PROJECTTABLENAME$ J ON B.PROJECTTYPE = J.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL D ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = D.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_USER E ON B.EXECUTOR = E.GUID LEFT JOIN SA_GROUP F ON B.OWNERGROUP = F.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL I ON B.ONTIMESTATE = I.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL G ON B.IMPORTANCELEVEL = G.GUID LEFT JOIN MA_CODE_DETAIL H ON B.EXECUTESTATUS = G.GUID WHERE B.CLASSGUID = #CLASSGUID#
ORDER BY $SORTFIELD$
ORDER BY B.PLANSTARTTIME DESC
